column1: Dont go breaking my scale.
2,336 pounds. Yall need to learn some portion control.
All right, got it. 2,210 pounds.
OK, everybody smile. Ho! You lost 31 pounds.
2,184 pounds, for a grand total -- oh! You all gained five pounds back.
Still good. You guys lost a pound. You lost one pound.
Well you lost zero pounds.   No change.  On the bright side you gained zero pounds.
You guys lost four pounds.
I say we have a parade.
Two thousand one hundred seventy-five.  Sorry guys.
Whats up, Mike?
You a baby daddy?
Hell yeah.  You know why?  Because that was my baby.
You should stop calling yourself "baby daddy."
Because youre not a daddy, and its not your baby.
You feel connected to his baby over there?
You feel connected to this?
You want to hold me, to see how you feel?
No.
Mike gave me a list of his top ten Springsteen songs. Three of them were Huey Lewis and the News. One was Tracy Chapman, Fast Car. And my personal favorite, Short People.
Hey Mike, do my thing.
Mike, you cant do that. Its conflict of interest.
Sold! To Jim.
She thought I was McNabb.
Yeah, well, watcha gonna do?
Whats up, Roy?
Oh, whats up, Roy?
Hey! Do Not Touch My Radio.
Mike youll drive this every weekend?
This trip was longer than I thought.
Not really.
Four hours. Almost halfway there.
Next exit isnt for five miles.
Theres nothing out here man.
WHAT!?
Clever, Mike.
Hey whats up, I just thought Id try you. I was thinking about that story where you ran into the girl you used to babysit.
Please call me back.
Please...
Theres another dolly in the truck, Mike. You could take more than that lamp.
This is the last of it.
Youre not staying?
But you want me to put it back in the truck.
I know its hard Mike. Break-ups hurt.
Looked like it. Sometimes when Im down like this, it helps to sing the blues.
Da na na na na...  da na na na  na...
Da  na na na na.  No, no, check it out, look. Da  na na na na... want to do that?
Thats when you hit me with whats getting you down, okay?
Da  na na na na.
Da  na na na na.
No, wait. Youre, youre supposed to... Never mind. Da  na na na na.
Da  na na na na.
Da  na na na na!!
Da  na na na na .
Yeah!  Da  na na na na.
YEAH! Da  na na na na.
I was there. That dude is not engaged. Im not a big believer in therapy, but Ill go into my own pocket to cover his co-pay.
Yo.
Thanks man.
All right man, dont cry.  Its cool.  Ill let you get it for $400.
You can owe me.
I know, right.  Merry Christmas.
Something wrong with the doll?
Mike claims, were all a family isnt that right?
Ok, so um, whats his name? All the way in the back there.
Whats his name?
Roy left years ago. Whats his name?
Whats
Nope. His name is Michael.
Start over.
Were the boxes near each other?
I put three pallets on the truck to Blue Cross once a week. They use a lot of paper.
Whatd I tell you about building forts in my warehouse?
